overview:
Tarah Feinberg has an extensive background in content creation and strategy. Before joining iCrossing, he was a digital innovation specialist and creative director at Real Branding (now Anthem Worldwide) where he provided creative and content strategy for brands including Lipton, Popeyes and Johnson & Johnson pharmaceutical brands.

Feinberg was also executive producer at Big Fuel Communications and a founding member of Digital Studio, NBC Universal’s first digital original content studio and innovation center.

At NBC, he led creative development, overseeing the creation and production of over 100 pilots and series, including a major branded initiative with Purina.
